name: Ippodrom
description: Ippodrom was the last station in out little metro photojourney across the city. It also was the calmest - no subway workers were bothering us and we had our time. Love how Margo interacts with the surroundings emphasizing the verticality of the columns. Also I enjoyed creamy-goldish tones of the interior and interesting use of light in the walls. Shot on Kodak Portra 400 film with 1978 Canon AE-1 manual camera.
